"Get some stability into the Mothership!:
"Erm, there is a huge gathering of various
enemies within the old abandoned
Mothership, and it seems that they are going
on a huge rampage! What I hear from the
subordinates in the midst of their investigations
is "Why is there such a gathering?" etc..
I can't just leave it alone like that!
During the investigations, I think it is tough
to subjugate... Won't you collaborate and help out?
*Target native species"
"マザーシップに平穏を！　Ⅰ"

"あの、放棄された旧マザーシップの内部で
いろんな惑星のエネミーが大集合して
大暴れしてるみたいなんだって！
なんでそんなのが集まってるのか、とかは
目下調査中って話なんだけど……
放ってなんておけないよねっ！
調査に討伐に、大変だと思うけど
協力してくれないかなっ？

※原生種が対象"
